p: Natural products are among the most important major resources for drug research and development in the past decades, especially for treating infectious diseases . Contagious disease treatment and control is widely demonstrated by effectiveness of medicinal herbs (Bouchentouf and Missoum 2020; Asadbeigi et al. 2014; Bouredja et al. 2020). A large number of diverse chemical structure compounds isolated from medicinal plants possessing antiviral activity and in this study only highly effective compounds were registered (Table 1). Twenty-one compounds were screened for in silico analysis using MOE Docking software. The best compounds interacting with SARS-CoV-2 M pro are shown in Table 2.
